TITLE: Pick your plan

BODY.FAMILY_DISCOUNT_ELIGIBLE: With Family Discount, get another SXM App login to share SiriusXM with the whole family.
BODY.FAMILY_DISCOUNT_ELIGIBLE_SUB_TEXT: The Family Discount requires at least one qualifying full price subscription plan on the same account.

INELIGIBLE_LOADING_ALERT: Unfortunately you aren't eligible for a Family Discount.
INELIGIBLE_LOADING_BODY: Finding another great plan for you.
